import React, { useState } from "react" import * as Components from './Components' import './login2.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function Login2({setToken}) { const [loggedIn, setLoggedIn] = useState(false); const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [signIn, toggle] = React.useState(true); const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') return(
Create Account Sign Up Sign in Forgot your password? Sign In Welcome Back! To keep connected with us please login with your personal info toggle(true)}> Sign In Hello, Friend! Enter Your personal details and start journey with us toggle(false)}> Sign Up
) } export default Login2
